text: Cartoon Network is a European pay television channel broadcast in the Czech Republic, Hungary, Moldova, Romania, and Slovakia. It launched on 1 October 2008 as a separate feed from the Polish feed, and is owned by AT&T;'s WarnerMedia under its International division. == History == A Czech audio track was added to the channel on 20 September 2017. That same year, on 20 October, Cartoon Network started broadcasting 24 hours a day. On 26 February 2018, the channel launched a high-definition feed. Later, on 15 October, Cartoon Network changed its aspect ratio from 4:3 to 16:9. ==Programming blocks== * Afternoon Fun on Cartoon Network * Marathon Mix * Toony Tube * Teen Titans Go! title: Cartoon Network (Central and Eastern Europe)
